Name: mal-abdulhameedmada-lad
Author: Abdul Hameed Madani And Kunhi Mohammed

Translations.Text: ānakkārekkeāṇṭ ninṟe rakṣitāv pravartticcat eṅṅane enn nī kaṇṭillē
kūṭṭaṅkūṭṭamāyikkeāṇṭuḷḷa pakṣikaḷe avaruṭe nērkk avan ayakkukayuṁ ceytu
aṅṅane avan avare tinneāṭukkappeṭṭa vaikkēāl turumpupēāleyākki
